title: PRDescriptionConfig
description: Configuration for PR description validation. Defines the PR body text, files in the PR, and patterns for significant files that should be mentioned.

filesInPR.description: List of files changed in the PR

significantExtensions.description: File extensions considered significant for warning when not mentioned

significantPaths.description: Path prefixes for files that should be mentioned in PR description

requiredSections.description: Required sections in PR description (matched as ## or ### headers)

validateChecklist.description: Whether to validate that checklist items are completed
